I received the camera yesterday and was amazed by the clarity of the pictures.  I was able to take amazing shots of my animals inside with very dim light.  With my other more expensive camera my dog would have been blurry and dark or far too light.  I love my camera so far and would advise others to ignore that one negative review I came across.

Reviews.Title: very NICE
Reviews.Author: Dan "Good products and services please???"
Reviews.Content: I lost my last Olympus, then got this one to replace it.WHERE WERE YOU A YEAR AGO!!!Very nice cam....simple and easy to use.  (read the instructions though).:-0enjoy!!!!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: irena
Reviews.Content: I bought this  camera for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it.We go boating a lot so now we don't have to  worry about water splashes. Easy to use, great big screan, good looking camera

Reviews.Title: Olympus stylus 790 SW
Reviews.Author: Saul Tave
Reviews.Content: I like the camera.  It is simple to use as point and shoot.  I'll get into the complicated stuff as time goes by.  The transfer software is somewhat different that what I am used to, so I have some learning to do, but it works well enough.  The test will come in June, on the Colorado River, when I get to use it for the purpose for which I bought it.

Reviews.Title: No View finder a big problem
Reviews.Author: Lisa Corley "BSA Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for backpacking because it was waterproof and small. I didn't think that the lack of a viewfinder would make the camera impossible to use on a sunny day. I took it to Death Valley with me and outside in the sun I had to guess at the shots I was taking because I couldn't tell by looking at the LCD screen. Fortunately I had a old camera with me and used that for the rest of the trip.

Reviews.Title: Don't make my mistake!
Reviews.Author: Josh T. Nite
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after a 5-foot drop killed my wonderful Casio Exilim.  I got it precisely because it is rugged and waterproof, and figured that was worth the extra money.  And it is - if you don't mind the TERRIBLE PICTURE QUALITY.The Casio excelled at taking pictures in low light.  If you turned off the flash and set it to anti-shake, it would warn you about low exposure, but it would still take the picture with quick shutter speed to minimize blurring.  It was perfect for concerts, campfires, candlelight, any time you didn't want a flash.This camera is USELESS in low light.  As soon as you turn of the flash, it slows the shutter speed waaaay down.  I have tried using the presets for "candlelight," "available light," and "night scene," and they all slow  the shutter speed and recommend using a TRIPOD (yeah, sure, got one in my pocket).  You can't even MANUALLY speed up the shutter with the flash off.  It overrides your settings and you end up with blurry pictures.  Any time you're not in direct sunlight, or taking pictures with the camera's auto-flash, expect to take multiple pictures, cursing and fiddling with settings, and still ending up blurry.  It's terrible.Not only that, but it has a far shorter battery life than the Casio Exilim and seems to loose its charge even when not in use.Not only THAT, but it takes a weird proprietary XD memory card.  I have a brand new laptop with a reader that takes 4 different formats, but not this one.  Don't expect to pop the memory stick out and put it in your reader -- don't lose the USB cable!I want to cry when I think of the Exilim, which cost $100 less than this doorstop of a camera.  I'm stuck constantly charging the battery, endlessly messing with the settings -- this is only a point-and-shoot camera in broad daylight with the subject ten feet away.  It's laughable. I wish it would break so I could justify getting another Casio, which makes its ruggedness a drawback at this point.

Reviews.Title: Failed after one snorkeling trip
Reviews.Author: Scott Tandy "CA Camera"
Reviews.Content: Like others who have written, my camera failed after just one snorkeling adventure.  It was clear that water entered the camera and it stopped working.  It is probably fine for those who don't actually want to use it in the water.

Reviews.Title: Camera not waterproof
Reviews.Author: M. Hocevar
Reviews.Content: I bought the Olympus Stylus 790SW for my daughter and figured the waterproof camera would be great around our pool.  The camera, at least the one I purchased, is not waterproof.  Water got into the battery compartment and the camera stopped working within minutes of making contact with water.  Sent the camera back to Olympus as it was only several weeks old and still under warranty.  They repaired it, but unfortunately the camera immediately failed the next time it was used in the pool.  Now I am again sending it back for repair.  Reading the reviews from others it appears that a fairly high percentage are defective (i.e. not waterproof as Olympus claims).  Based on my experience with this model, I have given up on waterproof cameras.  I'm buying my daughter a Canon and intend to use the Olympus as an expensive paperweight

Reviews.Title: Bad customer service from Olympus
Reviews.Author: Lynne "Lynne"
Reviews.Content: My 16 year old daughter received the silver 790 SW for Christmas from a relative. The reason she chose this camera over others is due to the advertising of being shockproof, freezeproof, dust/rain/waterproof. She opened it on Christmas morning. It was with her at all times... and broken by Jan. 15. It fell about 3 feet from her desk at school. The LCD screen cracked. It remains cracked and black to this day.I have been trying to get some help and answers from Olympus, and so far no one has responded to my queries.When she gets another camera, it won't be an Olympus. Simply due to customer service.

Reviews.Title: failed in salt water
Reviews.Author: Sue E. Paananen
Reviews.Content: This camera failed after 10 min snorkeling in salt water.  It seemed to do ok when just exposed to water in the rain or while on a canal trip in an inner tube.  Average ease of use, screen very difficult to see in sun light.  Can not judge image quality, they were lost with the xd card damaged while snorkeling.  To Olympus credit their service department was helpful, and they did replace the camera.An average compact camera, just not as waterproof as they advertise.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever!! had for 5 years and is still fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Tyler
Reviews.Content: Best camera ever!!! would like to buy a new one but just can not justify it because this one still works so well.the pic quality is enough for the point and shot pics that I take with it. Have had it for 5 years now its got scraches some dents and has been in may places in the US even to Korea and Thailand. Taken it on 4 cruses many camping trips and hikes, its been in the ocean, swimming pools, hot tubs, natural hot springs/pots, lakes, rivers, even in nice water fountains in public places (when I am feeling a bit artsy) I will never go back from having a water/shock proof camera (oh and countless drops from 6ft high). this has been the very best camera for my active life style. After 5 years the water proofness is waring out abit, I still dunk it under water and take pictures and everything its just that it cant stay in my pocket wile I am swimming for long periods of time any more. I would recomend this camera to anyone, in fact I do every time some one comments on having a camera. If your thinking about getting an olympus water proof camera think no more, just buy it you will not be disapointed.

Reviews.Title: Apparently not Waterproof
Reviews.Author: Hailey Harper
Reviews.Content: This camera lasted about 5 minutes before it stopped working. It was submerged only briefly on and off during that time. Then the lens fogged up and it only took blurry pictures. Then, a few minutes later it stopped working all together. It wouldn't turn on at all. I tried charging the battery, but so far nothing seems to make it work. I had such high hopes

Reviews.Title: JUNK!!
Reviews.Author: P. A. Hunter
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in 2007. Used it very little(less than 100 photos). I took it on a fall hiking trip and it worked at first then started taking photos that looked like a sheer white curtain was in front of the lens. After a  long conversation with the repair dept. at Olympus they said I should send it in to be repaired. Several days later they contacted me and said it would cost $155.00 to fix it! When I ask what was wrong with it the guy said they wouldn't be able to tell until they got inside the camera. When I ask how they came up with the $155 repair bill he had no answer but instead offered to make me a "great" deal on a newcamera. Feeling I had no other choice I bought a new Olympus TG-320 from them for $109.00 and they kept my broken camera.If you check on Amazon anyone can get this camera for this price. The Big camera shops also are offering it for about that price. To add  to the insult they sent the wrong color! I will never be purchasing anything from Olympus again.

Reviews.Title: Great Little, Tough Camera for kids and family!
Reviews.Author: Cliftons
Reviews.Content: McKenzie's Review (6 years old): This camera takes very good pictures.  You can drop it on the ground and it still works.  You can take pictures under water (she has).  It takes very good videos.Kylie's Review (4 years old): As she takes a picture of McKenzie's V-reader and reviews the picture and smiles.  (Perfect quality pictures almost every time.)Daddy's Review: I love these camera's, especially used by my kids.  They work great! Small and light and easy to carry around. My kids were always wanting to use the family camera.  A few times the cameras were dropped and didn't work right anymore.  So, I got them their own cameras.  McKenzie had a different waterproof camera and it died from going under water.  It took good pictures.  Kylie's Hello Kitty camera is cute, but her pictures continually come out blurry and a waste of time.  Now, both my girls have their own 790SW camera and they repeatedly take great pictures and appear to be very tough cameras.  I liked them so much that I bought another similiar Olympus camera for work.  I really like the LED light for super macro pictures!  There are way more menus than they need to use, but if you just set it on IS (image stabilazation) with flash on auto, they can click and click while taking good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: SerenityNow
Reviews.Content: I enjoy it's underwater features. It is stylish and easy to use. It takes excellent photos and is in a price range that suits my needs. I am not a professional and just wanted it for snorkling and beach trips; I was tired of risking my iphones life everytime I was near water and wanted a picture.

Reviews.Title: Years later review
Reviews.Author: Daddyg
Reviews.Content: I have owned the camera for years now and just now writing a review. Battery life is great and picture quality is super. This camera has been everywhere with me and in some very rough places I might add and has held its own very well. For the price I paid for it on here you can't bet it.

Reviews.Title: Good for some things, but not for others
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and used it on several kayaking trips where it got SLIGHTLY wet and the camera functioned just fine.  However, I just took it underwater for the first time while snorkeling and it leaked into every area (i.e. battery and memory card slots, plug in port, etc) and quit working.  It's supposed to be waterproof up to 10', and I was maybe 1'-2' underwater.I ended up taking out the memory card and battery and blow drying the camera until it was dry.  Eventually, it started up again.  However, the next day I tried taking it snorkeling again and it IMMEDIATELY started leaking and quit working, and now no buttons/functions will work -- not even the power button.  It is completely dead and does not appear that it's fixable.It is going in the trash.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly good photos, rugged, wish had more manual controls
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: Overall a terrific compact camera. Photos came out much better than expected. I didn't try its waterproof'ness, but it's certainly rugged and weather strong rain. Battery life is average. I recommend getting an extra battery. Wish it used regular SD chip rather than XD. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera--great especially if you have little kids
Reviews.Author: Leah C. Lively "llwcl"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera after our (then) two year old got ahold of our other little digital and decimated it....This little camera is tough, can get wet, get dropped and be taken in the snow.  While the pictures will never be as good as a heavy duty digital, they are quite good (you do have to master the different settings).  The shutter speed can be low and I do advise getting an extra battery.  But if you need a hearty little camera with really good picture quality and portability this camera is for you.  I would buy it again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: The best camera
Reviews.Author: Lady in Red
Reviews.Content: This camera makes the best pictures - in all types of weather and lighting conditions.  So portable, fits easily into jeans pocket, purse, shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: Just Fine ...
Reviews.Author: Syed Adnan Alam "Zeto"
Reviews.Content: I bought this in Dec 2007 and still in my use, I wouldnt say its awesome, but its average. in day light, beach, greenery, landscape its good but at evenings, indoor & in nights it doesn't deliver good results, picture becomes very much grainy. The Major drawback is FLASH, it whitens the picture awkwardly and picture loses its originality. During the years of my use, I rarely used the Flash. Now I have just ordered Panasonic FZ35, Lets see how it will work ...Panasonic Lumix DMC-FZ35 12.1MP Digital Camera with 18x POWER Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD

Reviews.Title: Its ok
Reviews.Author: M. Kaiser
Reviews.Content: I have a destructive toddler, and my parents wanted to buy me a new camera as a gift, and this is the one they got. I dont like the picture quality at all. My canon took way better pictures. Id say about 1 out of every 30 of the pictures I take with this camera are post worthy. Ive tried every possible setting and either the flash is too bright, everything i take a picture of looks like its got about a week to live after watching some tragic video, too dark, or just plain blurry. But my son has definitely tested out the waterproof capabilities of this camera and tested the olympus shatterproof claim and they have held up. I guess its ok for now. I would just like to have better pictures of my son. I plan on getting a Canon rebel after christmas for myself and giving this camera to my son.

Reviews.Title: indestructible
Reviews.Author: S. D.
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera with the intention of taking it outdoors for hiking, rock climbing, snorkeling, trail running, etc...Although the picture quality was not perfect, we were able to capture all our adventures on this camera. When we took it Rock climbing in southwest Washington, I had it in my pocket on a snowy climb and it fell 35 feet out of my pocket, bounced on the rocks below and survived. The camera still worked perfectly! Any camera that can take a fall like that and still work, taking even more beatings over time, is amazing.I highly recommend this product to any outdoor enthusiast who is afraid of breaking their camera. This one won't break. I hear their new camera, the "tough" is supposed to be even better.

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: H. Glenn
Reviews.Content: I spend a lot of time with my family at the beach/pool, so I figured this would be a good option. Nope. After two times underwater it stopped working. I wasn't able to see the pictures or download them. A couple weeks later is started working again so I used it underwater just in a pool, and again the same thing happened. I was even cleaning it in fresh water after using it. The memory card is rusty from the camera being in salt water while I snorkeled, so obviously it's NOT COMPLETELY WATERPROOF. It also has a water spot in the inside of the lens that I can't remove. I should have saved my money and just bought a regular non waterproof camera, I feel that it would have taken better quality photos. Not worth it!

Reviews.Title: Was great until it leaked (twice)
Reviews.Author: Pat Mottley "Sorryforpartying"
Reviews.Content: I have had THREE of these cameras.  The first one I broke due to leaving in a hydraulic lift and smashing the LCD (my fault-no fault of the camera).  Surprisingly, the fine folks at Olympus repaired it for free.  Unfortunately, that camera broke the first time I went snorkeling with it in less that 5 feet of water.  I then returned it again, and Olympus sent me a brand new camera.Sadly, while in Hawaii that camera broke while snorkeling again!  This was also iN less than 5 feet of water.  Overall, I was pleased with the photo quality and the drop-ability, but the camera never proved waterproof.  I took it underwater twice and twice it broke; there is a design flaw in the battery compartment gasket. I just don't trust in on vacation anymore and will probably be buying the Pentax waterproof camera next.

Reviews.Title: really indestructible but gives me blurry shots
Reviews.Author: Busy Mom of Two
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera out of desperation, as my toddler has broken 2 canon cameras.... but canon cameras give way better picture quality.  i have had this olympus camera now for almost 2 years, and it really is great for the beach, by the pool, or when the toddler-now-5-year old wants to take a picture -- but the pictures do come out a bit grainy, which is annoying when you capture a really great smile... but the picture isn't that clear.  I am considering to buy another canon camera, and keep this one for the sporty occasions.

Reviews.Title: 4 stars for Olympus warranty, minus 1 star for durability
Reviews.Author: R. Eye
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera for our son who builds water parks and takes photographs of job progress.  We figured he would need a camera that was waterproof and rugged.  It fit the bill, however, it was crushed by his leaning on it when it was perched on the center console in his truck.  Now, our son is not a heavy man so we were perplexed that it crushed.  The crush job destroyed the LCD screen.  But since it had been less than 1 year, we contacted Olympus and sent the camera with receipt to them and received the repaired (and new looking) camera very quickly.  We were quite pleased that Olympus honored the crush warranty for this camera.  Now our son has another Olympus (that we purchased on Amazon) that is an upgrade and we have this one.  He was also very pleased with the photo quality of the camera.  Recommend, yet do not think this camera cannot crush with moderate pressure.  Do not recommend the price as we paid much less than the price listed here ($399)today.

Reviews.Title: Handy Camera for many occasions
Reviews.Author: Shazzer
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera since September 2007. I took it to Egypt, Aruba, Belize. I took about 1400 photos in Egypt -in the water, in the desert, from the bus window, at night, at sunrise and sunset -the only 'bad' photos were due to photographer (ME) error -the shutter lag is very long which is easy to forget.  I have taken many pictures both above and below water. It takes great photos! You just have to be aware of the shutter lag which seems longer here, than with my Kodak digital camera but the kodak doesn't go underwater. I have taken pictures in the rain, dropped the camera and still great photos. In Belize, I banged the camera on the ladder after snorkeling, however, I was still able to take great photos using a "point and shoot" method as I was unable to see the image on the LCD screen (handy information should this happen to you) and I had to weigh the price of repair versus a new camera (of course, I would upgrade to the 1030 if I bought a new one) and opted for the repair. Fast, reliable service with good repair of my camera (and they gave me a new battery too), thanks Olympus.  Back to taking great photos within a week. LOVE this camera!

Reviews.Title: Hard as nails and takes great pictures !!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Andrew Mcjannett-smith "AndyMcJ"
Reviews.Content: I purcahsed this as a Christmas present for my step daughter, she is very heavy handed and dare I say it clumsy, it has taken several drops to the ground and has a few war wounds and scars on it now, but it still works perfectly.It has enough gadgets on it to keep a teenager occupied for ages, the picture quality is amazing compared to a lot of compact camera's around this price range... altogether a great buy... and highly recommended for those people whom are less than delicate with electronics.PS, I would not recommend trying to do what they do in the advert with it though, as I doubt it would survive intact... but is is still very tough.

Reviews.Title: OLYMPUS 790SW
Reviews.Author: yukon ho "hobbes"
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS GREAT, TAKE REALLY GOOD QUALITY, COLOR, DIGITAL PICTURES. I CARRY IT AROUND ALL DAY IN POCKET SO IT GETS A LOT OF WEAR AND TEAR AND IT STILL WORKS GREAT. CANT SAY ENOUGH GOOD ABOUT IT. IF YOU NEED A CAMERA THAT CAN GO ANYWHERE UNDER SEVERE CONDITION THIS IS THE CAMERA TO TAKE. IT'S NOT A SLR BUT YOU CAN TAKE IT PLACES WHERE YOU NORMALLY WOULDN'T HAVE YOUR SLR. GREAT CAMERA, GREAT PRICE.

Reviews.Title: Amazing compact camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Muller
Reviews.Content: This camera is absolutely amazing.  I have had it for over a year now and have used it in almost every imaginable environment.  It is ideal for snorkeling and I have not had a single issue with temperature extremes from 120 to 0 degrees F.  This is a perfect camera to pack along anywhere you go.  A would recommend this to anyone who needs a simple compact camera for most activities.

Reviews.Title: poor overall design
Reviews.Author: Bernard A. Crenn
Reviews.Content: Olympus Stylus 790SW 7.1MP Waterproof Digital Camera with Dual Image Stabilized 3x Optical Zoom (Orange)Very disappointing camera. The lens is right where your finger needs to be to hold the camera well.  You cannot shoot before a 2 second delay and having to press OK buttons.  Overall poor ergonomic and software design (includes all the other 1 star issues mentioned: poor image quality, poor video quality, etc.).  The Pentax is a much better product, I have now used 2 very happily.Bernard

Reviews.Title: Bad water proof system
Reviews.Author: Juan Pablo Torres Almeida "JUAN PABLO"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because i was traveling to galapagos and i thought that this trip deserves a water proof camera. But at the third day that I sumerge the camera in to the sea it got water inside. The camara broke down and i couldnt take any more pic in my trip. :(

Reviews.Title: Best camera for a kid
Reviews.Author: Chairissa P. Huie
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for a kid.  It looks good and is water resistant and shockproof.  However, make sure to read the directions together to learn to use it well.  They're easy to follow and have plenty of pictures.  This camera is kid and user friendly.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy Camera for City Public Works Dept
Reviews.Author: Kirsten Danielson "KD"
Reviews.Content: I have purchase 7 of the Olympus Stylus 790SW cameras for the City in their Parks & Rec, Building & Zoning, Engineering, and Utilities departments.  They are sturdy and easy to use. In addition, a screen protector has been purchased for each camera. There have been no complaints with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great waterproof camera, takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Charles Strand
Reviews.Content: I used a Pentax waterproof camera prior to purchasing the Olympus, and was satisfied with that one, but wanted a better quality picture. I purchased the Olympus and got just that! The picture quality is just as good as what I got from my non-waterproof camera, the screen size was great, the camera super easy to use, I couldn't ask for more!On a side note, I also purchased one of these for my son, and his was defective, malfunctioning as soon as it got in the water. Olympus of course replaced it, I think one of the seals was just bad.

Reviews.Title: WATERPROOF AND FOOLPROOF!!!
Reviews.Author: Klimari
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this camera.  I purchased it for the waterproof capability, though I never thought I could take such GREAT shots. POSTCARD QUALITY.  BELIEVE IT!I used the SCN setting a lot for available light (I hate a flash) and other situations and that feature helped tremendously.Even the video clips come out great!Ken from NJCHECK OUT A FEW OF THE PICS I POSTED...

Reviews.Title: Amazing underwater photos
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in November because I wanted a waterproof camera. I was worried that it would be slow at taking pictures like the Nikon point and shoots. After using it for a week, I had decided to buy my sister one for Christmas. It is a great camera that easily fits it your pocket and you can carry it anywhere. The photo quality isn't quite as good as my Canon. I have taken this camera to the pool, waterpark, beach, and on a few ski trips. The underwater photo quality is amazing; even better than the out of water photo quality. As many have suggested, if you don't need a waterproof or rugged camera buy something else and save the money. Camera around $130 are comparable as far as image quality and speed, but they can't get wet. I would recommend this camera to anyone who needed it.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Sheya Blackwell "suganj"
Reviews.Content: got this for a friend.  she has a 2 yr old son and loves water rides, she loves this camera

Reviews.Title: So far I love this - fits in your pocket and can go underwater
Reviews.Author: Kim Mahahual "mmbkim"
Reviews.Content: I took this camera for a swim two days ago and was very surprised at the quality.  The conditions were murky, yet still many of the pictures turned out better than I thought they would.  I like how long the battery lasts, (although the original charge didn't last very long) -- once I recharged it, it lasted a long time -- still running after an hour-long swim where I left it on and then looked at the shots after.  The only negative that I can think is that there isn't a through the lens viewer.  My reading sight is starting to go and I have a hard time seeing the viewer.  Also when the sun is out it is impossible to see the LCD viewer so I find myself guessing what I am shooting.  Other than that -- I'm a fan and don't regret buying it for one minute.

Reviews.Title: fun fun fun
Reviews.Author: Josie Platts "Josie"
Reviews.Content: we love this camera...it is fun to use and knowing that if it gets wet or is dropped...is such a comfort..because my hubbie is hard on things and we have 5 small children who are curious and inventive...

Reviews.Title: Very good deal
Reviews.Author: Marizol Castro "Marizol"
Reviews.Content: the camera is really amazing. The purchase and the shiping by Adorama Store (Seller)was in time like always

Reviews.Title: Olympus Waterproof Camera
Reviews.Author: Cookie Monster "CAM"
Reviews.Content: Good Feel in Hands & Many Colors to Choose from.7.1MP, Auto Lens Cover, Big LCD Screen that you can actually see in Sun, No Viewfinder though. Waterproof and Dropable from 10ft.How cool is that. Many Menu Settings with lots to choose from.I really liked the Multiple Frames feature, just hold button down and it keeps shooting, Fun for Sports and Action.I compared to another waterproof(Pentax)point and shoot I own. The Olympus Picture Quality and Color Saturation far superior and I like the Image Stabilize thing since I always move...Good Price too.Buy another Battery and 1 gig card and your set to go anywhere...

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot, indestructible
Reviews.Author: Daniela Nomura
Reviews.Content: This is all around a great selection for anyone who needs a point-and-shoot digital and might use it for vacations. It's waterproof and pretty indestructible, so how can you go wrong? The size is great, it also has a nice large LCD screen. Standard manual options are available, plus the image-stabilizing capabilities. It could stand for more optical zoom, but since you are able to take very hi-res photos, it's okay to crop images later on your computer and still end up with a fairly large photo. I am happy with its ability to playback and erase images quickly.This was a gift and the recipient is very happy!

Reviews.Title: Good buy.
Reviews.Author: George A. Hinkson "spidude"
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality in good lighting environments. Enough picture modes/profiles to fit pretty much anyone's requirements. Excellent waterproof point and shoot for anyone looking for a robust vacation cam.

Reviews.Title: Set Yourself Free from Limitations with Durability
Reviews.Author: Yeorwned
Reviews.Content: From a durability perspective, this camera cannot be beat for the price. Since I'm not afraid to damage it, I find myself using it in many situations I would otherwise be afraid to use a digital camera. Considering the damage I've done, there are very few to no scratches on the case itself.Depending on conditions, the battery can take as little as 100 pictures before requiring a recharge, which is difficult if you are using in an underwater environment. While I did purchase an additional battery to prevent being restricted on battery life, I would not change it while in the water.The Olympus lighting issues do often plague this camera as well, much like my other models. The shutter time is ridiculously long if there is low light, causing the image to blur. Night vision mode can take up to 6 full seconds before the picture is taken, which unless is mounted and not moving does not produce a usable image.

Reviews.Title: Great dry land pics poor underwater pics
Reviews.Author: Treas "Lover of a good story"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for two purposes. First to use in my ski business. I can let employees take it on the mountain to get ski shots, waterproof & shatterproof, important features for this use. Second I took it on a family vacation to Kauai and wanted to use it for snorkeling. Poor quality pictures underwater, a waste of time to use it in this way. It does take very good picture on land however, that is why I give it a 3 star, 2.5 stars would be more accurate. If I had to do it over I would buy a Canon, you can count on Canon quality. I chose the Olympus Stylus because of the underwater photography. It will work out fine for me because it primarily is for business abuse. For personal use buy a better camera.

Reviews.Title: I wish I could give it 6 stars
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera is exactly what is claims to be. Waterproof, shockproof, freezeproof, etc. I took this thing snowboarding at 12,500 feet with temps of 4 degrees F and it worked like a champ. Turns on in one second and makes great videos and pictures. I have a Nikon DSLR and love it, but this one is the camera that goes "outside" a lot. I am not saying the pictures are identical to my D50, but they are very good for a camera of this size and type. It even picks up the audio well, which is not that common.

Reviews.Title: Good waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Lynx
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera because of its waterproof feature.  We have just returned from a kayaking trip and the camera performed up to expectation.  Based on other reviews, that expectation did not include good color reproduction and, indeed, color reproduction was not its strong point.  We used it in manual mode which seemed to produce better pictures, but required us to learn quite a bit about the camera.  Still, if you need a waterproof, small digital camera, this seems to be the best option.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff Stegeman "Doors Fan"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an upgrade to my old Sony Cybershot, which I had for about 10 years. This is a good camera for a family because it will stand up to most of the abuse dished out by kids. It also has decent picture quality and is easy to use. I have taken it to the pool and taken it fishing and skiing several times. No problems with water, shock or temperatures. I don't think I would take this camera scuba diving. It just isn't a dive camera. So I have to laugh when I see other reviews here by tards who took the camera diving and then wondered why it malfunctioned.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever
Reviews.Author: Joseph Stark
Reviews.Content: I have the worst luch with cameras...with one being drowned, one getting sand in the lens area, and one being dropped, so I was very happy to get this camera. It is about every kind of proof it can be...waterproof, dust-proof, and shock proof. It also has a really cool feature on the camera itself that allows the user to auto-edit the picture before you even put it on your computer. With all the scene choices for the type of picture you are taking added in, this is the best camera I have ever owned.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: Ashley Victoria
Reviews.Content: takes really phenomenal outdoor pics - great at the pool, playground, and snow! I don't worry about taking it out because I do drop it all the time and I know that if it lands in the pool it'll be okay! very very very reliable.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Courtnay W. Bloomer
Reviews.Content: Great camera - very sturdy (dropped many times).  Definitely waterproof, at least to 5 feet (haven't tested it in deeper waters).  Easy to use and kid-friendly (resistent to sticky fingers!).Aesthetically nice, but easily scratched and dirty looking.  Lens cover protects well and has prevented scratching of the lens.

Reviews.Title: Awesome and fast
Reviews.Author: David W. Symons
Reviews.Content: camera was ordered the last week before christmas, used normal shipping, and it was still at my home by christmas eve!  i love the camera, and i got it for an unbeatable price!!!

Reviews.Title: Olympus 790 SW Outfit
Reviews.Author: E. Woodside
Reviews.Content: The product itself arrived in perfect condition and was timely shipped, -- no problem with that.  In looking at the image of the "kit", I thought I was buying a nice neat little gift package arrangement, but actually all of these parts were separate items, and were packaged individually.  Had I known this prior to purchasing, I would have custom made my own package and would have substituted some of the "package" items for more useful items.  Also, I'm not sure this was the most economical way to buy these items.Overall, I was pleased with the purchase - everything was in perfect condition, and the camera itself has been great so far.Other than this, I have no issue with this product.  Everything was in first-class condition.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  All the different functions are great, as long as you have a few seconds to flip through to the different functions.  If not, I would suggest only to use the anti-shake feature.  I missed some precious pictures of my nieces and nephews meeting for the first time because I wasn't able to flip through all the different scene functions in time.  Make sure to have an extra lion battery also otherwise you'll end up having to wait for it to be recharged before taking more pictures.  I have to charge mine every night.  Also the multiple pictures feature is great!  It takes many pictures rapidly as long as you hold down the button, but every few pictures turn out blurry.  I would suggest using the one speed slower if you use this function.  Other than these few difficulties, this is a great camera.  I haven't been abe to use the underwater function yet, but I'm looking forward to it!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Stephanie L. Watson
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  I like to play with the different modes; they really do make a difference in the picture.  We used the florecent lighting modes at a wedding and the pictures looked great!  Haven't tried the waterproof part out yet, haven't had a need.  I purchaced this camera because my sister did and they love it.  I love the fact that it's shock proof and that the lens doesn't extend out of the camera.  Our last digital camera broke because our niece dropped it, that won't happen with this one!

Reviews.Title: Timely
Reviews.Author: Dave Wallace
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for my daughter who had just purchased a kayak.  Thought it would be perfect for capturing wildlife pics along Michigan streams without fear of water damage.The order arrived on my doorstep within minutes of the time that she drove up with the new boat on top of her car. Perfect timing.  That weekend she toured the Kalamzoo river with friends and managed to swamp the new boat in fast water.  Suddenly realized what a worthy gift this was.  Certainly the ideal camera for any boater because we all get wet one way or another at one time or another.  And the quality is everything they said. Jewelry beautiful as well.All are happy and satisfied.Dave Wallaceainsco@iserv.net

Reviews.Title: Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: W. James "W James"
Reviews.Content: This camera has poor quality shots and pretty much always requires a flash. The waterproof feature is good, but it doesn't make up for the other bad things. I would not recommend this camera, and if your looking for a good point-and-shoot, get one of the Nikon Coolpix cameras or the Canons.

Reviews.Title: Olympus Stylus 790sw Comment
Reviews.Author: Alejandro D. Jovellar
Reviews.Content: My first impression when I got a hold of this product was that I couldn't believe it can handle the shock/torture it was supposed to handle. It just feels quite fragile but not in a bad way. Please don't get me wrong, its physical finish is quite a beauty that's why I can't seem to believe it's supposed to be as tough as it is.Shooting and features are acceptable on broad daylight but taking pictures during the night is quite below standard. I find the automatic shooting settings quite useless during the day or the night. With it being useless, you have to get used to a number of functions that come with the product so that you will get a good shot of a specific situation. This is quite annoying specially if you need to shoot something in a near instant.For now, I'm giving this product 3 stars since I haven't capitalized on its toughness and water resistant capabilities yet. If I'll be able to do so, this might get 4 stars from me.My recommendation would be to buy something else with its price range if you don't really need a tough camera. But if you don't like to go to service centers for camera problems and all that, then get this one. That's what I did.

Reviews.Title: its a used not new...
Reviews.Author: doni2000
Reviews.Content: there was scratches and there was actually a couple of people in the photo which i had to delete. the battery charger was not the two flat inserted plug but was two circle plug instead. probably from another country not usa. it was not a good buy for me so i gave to my 7 year old son instead since it ONLY hold 2GB XD picture card (not always available in any electronic stores). i now have to look and buy battery charger for this camera. this is a hassle and if you want to spend $100 on a camera then it wouldnt hurt to spend a little more for a better camera than this.

Reviews.Title: waterproof? No way!
Reviews.Author: RP
Reviews.Content: The 790SW I bought died just 3 times upon contact with water.Water got onto screen and the battery compartment.Call customer service, sent it (guaranty expires in 1 year).They told me that you have to send the camera for service every year (no were to be seen in owners manual)The repair was $250. The cost was $300 so I did not want to do the repair.I do not recommend this camera and the service.I purchase a Pentax Optio waterproof that friends and family recommended and they had been used for 'YEARS' without send it for "service"

Reviews.Title: Terrible photos, holiday memories ruined
Reviews.Author: R. Taplin
Reviews.Content: This is the worst camera I have ever owned by far. Every single on of the photos it took on holiday are blurry, over exposed or grainy. I have used cameras for many years and will never buy this brand again. Do not buy into the gimmicks about shock proof, just get a camera and look after it. If it is going to break it is going to break. These strong cameras just muck up picture quality and that's it.

Reviews.Title: Its Wife proof!
Reviews.Author: Joseph C. Alvarez Jr.
Reviews.Content: Awesome! I bought the camera for my wife and she loves it, great pictures. It has a large screen so you can view your pictures. Best of all its almost wife proof.  I would highly recommend the Olympus Stylus 790SW

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: inverona "JJ"
Reviews.Content: Its everything it claims to be. Very happy with selection and most of all price. Best deal out there and I shopped around.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping but not enough information about the product like if it comes with memory card
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Diaz
Reviews.Content: they need to put more info about the product.like if the product comes with memory card etc.

Reviews.Title: girlfriend loved it!!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Perez
Reviews.Content: this camera is ment for my girlfriend it is water proof you can drop it from 5 ft and it is still ok to use. this is the color she loves and it is easy to use thank you

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, but lost it :(
Reviews.Author: C. Mrachek "RJ's Mom"
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed the camera for about a month, but lost it while snowboarding in Vermont.  I did not get a chance to download any of the pictures from my memory card to my PC to see the quality, (which I am really SAD about) but it seemed like it would be great.  My next camera, I'll have to buy some kind of clip to attach it to my jacket!  I've had the worst luck with cameras in the past 2 months, since the Sony I had previously got wet and broke! The one thing I wish it took was a regular SD card, instead of the XD card.  Sony uses the Memory Stick Pro Duo .. I wish that all the digital cameras standardized their memory and their battery for that matter!

Reviews.Title: ruins precious moments!
Reviews.Author: norya taimreg
Reviews.Content: This camera ruins any social event you would like to capture. I bought this camera hoping it was the solution to every problem I have ever had in my life.  The problem with this camera is that it falls out of my pocket seemingly everytime I move my leg...walking, sitting or laying down.  You would think olympus would consider this seeing as how much you have to spend on the camera.  the camera is waterproof for sure, I sat at an aqua bar for 6 hours with it in my pocket, however when i stood up to get out of the water, the camera fell out of my pocket.  I went on a tubing trip recently and at some point the camera fell out of my pocket.  I could not capture any moments with friends to remember what happened on the trip.  I may never buy an olympus camera again, and am seriously considering writing a mean spirited letter to the company.  This camera has let me down multiple times by its only design flaw...falling out of pockets.  I read the reviews before purchasing the camera and had an idea of the risk I would be taking by purchasing a camera that could fall out of my pocket, but I put faith in olympus because they are the best camera maker.  I will be switching to pentax cameras from now on as they have been second best.  DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA IF YOU PLAN ON CARRYING IN YOUR POCKET!

Reviews.Title: Olympus digital camera
Reviews.Author: Sally Kudlicki
Reviews.Content: It is hard to give an opinion on this product as it was a Christmas gift to my son and his wife.  As far as I know, they are enjoying their camera and have not said anything negative about it

Reviews.Title: Awsom Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Abraham "ABE"
Reviews.Content: The purchase of this camea was well thaught out to meet peoples needs and it is awsom. So far best of all in rainy or cold weather it works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
7.1-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 15 x 20-inch prints
2.5-inch HyperCrystal LCD screen minimizes glare
3x optical zoom; Face Detection technology
Waterproof (down to 10 feet), freeze-proof, and crush-proof design
27 Shooting modes; in-camera editing options
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus Stylus 790SW 7.1MP Waterproof Digital Camera with Dual Image Stabilized 3x Optical Zoom (Silver)
